name: Easy Knit Pumpkin
full_text: FREE PATTERN AVAILABLE HERE! Ready to get cozy this fall? Get ready for the season with our easy pumpkin knitting pattern, perfect for crafters of all skill levels! Unleash your creativity and create adorable pumpkin decor that will bring warmth and charm to your home! Skill Level: Beginner WILL NEED: -5mm circular needles (16 in) -Bernat Premier yarn in Carott (one skein makes multiple pumpkins) -Scissors -Measuring Tape -Tapestry Needle -Polyfil or toy stuffing -Cinnamon Stick or Twig Share your finished pumpkins on socials and tag us! we would love to see your creations! Don’t forget to follow us on socials! Threads @cozythreadscanada Instagram @cozythreadscanada Facebook @CozyThreads - canada Pinterest @CozyThreads
